entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 95
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos from the special event 2000-0522 Visit, Topanga Canyon, CA, U.S.A. have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 6 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 2000.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
